content: I think it would be a great idea to focus on some specific themes or challenges for our class trip. Since we're just starting out, it would be helpful to have some guidance and structure to our photography. I like the idea of capturing a specific type of landscape, like mountains or waterfalls, or trying to get some portraits of each other in a natural setting. The idea of focusing on nature's details, like flowers or leaves, is also really appealing to me.
